## Worm.createNewSession() method

Creates a new session.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createNewSession(): number | null;
```
**Returns:**

number \| null

An identifier for the newly created session. Returns null if you cannot create a new session.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 16 GB
